data.text: RT @Airbus: Offering a true wide-body-like experience onboard a single-aisle cabin? The #A220 is up to the challenge! Welcome aboard @airBa…

Congratulations to the six airBaltic Pilot Academy students for receiving commercial pilot license upon completion of the full-time airline transport pilot program🎓 They were joined by the 13th group of 11 new students. Wishing both wonderful heights with their newfound wings!✈️ https://t.co/ht1Pa5kGks

data.text: Greetings from @FIAFarnborough! data.text: If you wish to travel in full comfort, we have something to make it come true - meet BUSINESS light! 🎩✈️ With this new ticket type, travelling with class has become more affordable, than ever! The list of perks is worthwhile, see them here and book away: https://t.co/nyjKF5h2J1 https://t.co/wy113OcNrf

urls.title: airBaltic ticket types | airBaltic
urls.description: Get to know the perks of the different airBaltic ticket types. Find out what fare rules apply to your ticket, and which services you can expect.

data.text: If you're all set for the next adventure, all you have to do is start getting ready! Pack a bag or two, because until Monday you can enjoy a 20% discount on checked baggage from "My booking" price! 🧳️ https://t.co/RW7YprVmNU
Have we reached a new destination - Upside Down? 🛸 Sometimes we fly so high, we slip into another dimension 🌌 https://t.co/p4hLSAZtlw

data.text: Set your alarms 🔔 cause the next airBaltic #NFT City Collection is launching this Friday, July 15 at 11:00 UTC. This collection features Jūrmala city #crypto art and will be available for purchase for a fixed price of 0.1 Ether: https://t.co/84Y61DW1jE https://t.co/lucq0oYSFA

urls.title: BLACK Friday GREEN SALE
urls.description: During the GREEN SALE flights to all airBaltic destinations are available at their lowest prices.

data.text: ❗️ It's the last day of our GREEN sale, don't miss out on the last bits of summer! 💚 Let it be urban travel somewhere in Germany, eatcation in one of the Italian destinations, or simply lounging next to the Greek sun, the best ✈️ starting from 19 EUR: https://t.co/KB3UN10iU0 https://t.co/0kwOAVQDHO

During the sunny month of June, we were glad to welcome 349 700 passengers on board 3500 flights! ✈️ That's 205% more than during the same period last year: https://t.co/mx3zG250uI https://t.co/pZJPhtTebv

urls.title: airBaltic carries three times as many passengers in June
urls.description: During June 2022, Latvian airline airBaltic has carried 349 700 passengers or by 205% more than during the same period last year

data.text: We have successfully launched our first ever Office in the sky project! ✈️🎉 It is as simple and as complex as it sounds - our office employees had the chance to apply, go through the selection process, and complete months of training to become a part of our crew. 💚 https://t.co/U04VxZWF1U

We are glad to attend Riga Aviation Forum today, reconnect with local aviation professionals and discuss such important topics as sustainability in aviation and other current challenges #RAF2022 https://t.co/zAfOpAgdl3

urls.title: Flights to Gran Canaria| airBaltic
urls.description: Book cheap flights from Riga to Gran Canaria with airBaltic. Take a short, direct flight from Riga to Gran Canaria and experience all that Gran Canarias has to offer!

data.text:
Another sunny destination joins our route list ☀️🇪🇸 Starting November 1, 2022, we're launching new flights from Riga to Gran Canaria, Spain - the perfect leisure destination this winter 🌴
✈️ Flights to Gran Canaria will be available twice a week: https://t.co/ZBOk9obWfz https://t.co/Cl3YiILjVy

urls.title: airBaltic introduces sustainable technician uniforms
urls.description: Latvian airline airBaltic announces that it has introduced new, modern high visibility uniforms for its technical staff supplied by their manufacturer FRISTADS, which is the first company to provide environmentally declared high-visibility uniforms.

data.text: We are excited to introduce sustainable, modern, high-visibility uniforms for our technical staff! The new uniforms are supplied by manufacturer FRISTADS, which is the first company to provide environmentally declared high-visibility uniforms: https://t.co/j883Ityb2r https://t.co/QspUqZz7UL

urls.title: Baltic Outlook magazine | airBaltic
urls.description: Be they adventurous backpackers or sophisticated voyagers, the monthly Baltic Outlook magazine is an excellent resource for any kind of travellers.

data.text: July issue of Baltic Outlook is out! 🗺️ This month the dreamy French seaside city, Nice is featured on the cover ☀️ Step into the old-world charm and let the golden light and sea breeze take care of you! To get inspired read the stories onboard & online: https://t.co/pwMFb60kWt https://t.co/ntRTjNHRjR

urls.title: airBaltic City Collection - Collection | OpenSea
urls.description: airBaltic – the flag carrier of Latvia, in honour of Latvia’s centenary, in 2018, invited everyone to vote on their favourite towns and cities in Latvia, after which the company’s Airbus A220-300 fleet was named. Starting with Kuldiga, these cities will now one by one be represented on the digital art pieces issued by airBaltic. airBaltic’s jet fleet is the youngest in the Europe, consisting solely of the brand new Airbus A220-300.

data.text: We're incredibly proud to announce that airBaltic has been chosen as the winner of Diversity & Inclusion Team Award by International Air Transport Association @IATA, in a ceremony that took place during the annual general meeting in Doha, Qatar 🎉 #IATAAGM https://t.co/6RyJXe13YK

We have reached the highest employee count in the 26 years of the airBaltic group! Our airBaltic family now has over 1800 highly motivated, skilled members.💚
Nonetheless, we’re looking forward to welcoming even more as we continue our growth: https://t.co/FRmUwRYYbG https://t.co/fj4FoSz6Yi

urls.title: airBaltic announces new winter destination – Marrakesh
urls.description: airBaltic announces that starting from late October it will launch new flights from Riga to Marrakesh in Morocco

data.text:
Morocco, here we come! ☀️🇲🇦 Starting late October this year, we're launching a new route from Riga to Marrakesh - our first ever scheduled route to Africa!
✈️ Flights to Marrakesh will be available twice a week: https://t.co/4yXvoiDbik https://t.co/rfGyO4mirx

We have some pretty great news - our network is expanding! 💚 And you may ask, what could be better than a new destination? Two new destinations! ✈️✈️ 

Here are some hints... Can you guess them? 👀 Keep an eye out for the reveal next week! https://t.co/7pxmkL4Arh

During May, we were glad to carry 284 700 passengers, which is the most passengers carried since the beginning of the pandemic! ✈️ This is more than 3 times during the same period last year: https://t.co/cgbRokjlPf https://t.co/JMITV1OTTJ

urls.title: airBaltic passengers up more than 300% in May
urls.description: In May 2022, airBaltic performed 3 490 flights.

data.text:

Travel ✈️ 28.06 - 29.10.2022 https://t.co/W4VpFTlBpY

data.text:

👨‍✈️👩‍✈️ Join the team: https://t.co/clr8jOyPMX https://t.co/dfFZWHmq8O

data.text:
We are excited to launch new direct flights between Tampere and Amsterdam 🇳🇱
✈️ Unique museums, bike rides, charming canals and cozy cafes - now both cities are connected with two weekly flights: https://t.co/FdjbAzALQA https://t.co/FbOWiFisAK

Traveling with your four legged friend has never been more pawsome! 😺✈️🐶 Plan ahead and fly to destinations across Europe by adding the pet transportation service to your booking via our Call Center agents. 

🐾 More detailed info can be seen here: https://t.co/umtMXUqOOX https://t.co/ony9XdVjCl

Happy International Flight Attendants Day 💚
Today we are celebrating people who call the sky their second home - our wonderful cabin crew! ✈️ We're thankful for the dedication, care and joy you bring every day that make you the heart and soul of aviation. https://t.co/TQKSJNFnXK

Baltic countries have their unique charm that pulls everyone in. 🇱🇻🇪🇪🇱🇹 Sandy beaches, astonishing architecture, and fantastic cuisine is just the start. Let the countries speak for themselves and book flights to Riga, Tallinn, and Vilnius now on sale ✈️: https://t.co/I31wmX7axH https://t.co/dVPshfVVmv

data.text: Greetings to the newest addition to our fleet – YL-ABJ! 👏 This morning we accepted our 36th @Airbus A220-300 jet. This is the fourth of eight planned Airbus aircraft deliveries for us this year. https://t.co/I1xEbft3kH

Ja Juris Gaisiņš var kļūt par stjuartu, tad to vari arī tu! ✈️🤩 https://t.co/nyyF1lh7Cg
Viss, kas tev nepieciešams ir vismaz 18 gadi, vidusskolas atestāts kabatā, angļu valodas zināšanas (psst, mēs nodrošinām valodu apmācības, nesatraucies 😉) un peldētprasme! ✈️ Lidojam kopā?

🍒 Start your summer right by taking a bite out of our cherry prices! 🍒 Soak up the sun and good vibes in the most gorgeous cities of Europe, go on and join the party: https://t.co/tdTIKmJOyj

🎫 Book 24.05 - 02.06.2022.
✈️ Travel 20.06 - 29.10.2022 https://t.co/rSCNc1q0MI

data.text: And that's a wrap on the Airbus #A220 Asia-Pacific Demo Tour 👏✈️ Thank you to our friends from @Airbus for inviting us to showcase the state-of-the-art A220-300 through Sydney, Singapore, Hanoi and Tokyo & creating unforgettable memories! #A220Tour https://t.co/tndjHWo9Ik

With the largest graduation ceremony so far, sixteen airBaltic Pilot Academy students became graduates, receiving commercial pilot licenses upon completion of the full-time airline transport pilot program🎓Congratulations on your deserved success and a smooth career take-off!✈️ https://t.co/0X3hUiP6oM

data.text: We're growing! ✈️ In line with the gradual recovery of the aviation market, we have started recruitment of a total of 120 additional pilots - our airBaltic Pilot Academy graduates, former employees and external pilots. Read more: https://t.co/m90gg9dg0A https://t.co/3zxHwHQ39E

Have you met GREEN classic?🎩It's classically good, has everything a passenger could need: free airport check-in, checked baggage, seat reservation, and more!💚Purchase GREEN classic tickets with a discount, save 15€ per one-way flight or 30€ round trip: https://t.co/22zsKZKVZf https://t.co/PdjCbqVOmr

The best news for our passengers and their four-legged friends!😸🐶 Now pets up to 12 kg can travel in the passenger cabin! Make sure to inform the airline, have all the necessary documents, and a travel bag that fits the dimensions. More information here: https://t.co/CBjSkjzn24 https://t.co/wdfMS74SlQ

data.text: Hello from the Pacific! 👋 We are excited to share that our green tails have reached the Asia-Pacific region to demonstrate our latest A220-300 aircraft on behalf of @Airbus. Appreciation of freedom has never been more important. May 4th marks a significant turning point in Latvian history - today we celebrate 32 years of restored independence thanks to the courageous Latvian nation 🇱🇻 Daudz laimes, Latvija! https://t.co/gyxDEnCoeB

urls.title: BLACK Friday GREEN SALE
urls.description: During the GREEN SALE flights to all airBaltic destinations are available at their lowest prices.

data.text: Still daydreaming about a sun-sational summer? ☀️ With our GREEN sale deals, the dreams can become reality! 🥰️ Wonderful prices paired with our seasonal destinations, such as Venice, Pisa, Malta have never sounded better: https://t.co/rvPOSRVFgD https://t.co/aEXYRQeI6q

Today is a very special day - we have opened our Tampere base! 💚✈️ We’re happy to bring our green tails beyond the Baltics to provide connectivity by offering direct flights to 8 amazing destinations: https://t.co/UuzSZHkZZK https://t.co/AuWwV70gU5

urls.title: Baltic Outlook magazine | airBaltic
urls.description: Be they adventurous backpackers or sophisticated voyagers, the monthly Baltic Outlook magazine is an excellent resource for any kind of travellers.

data.text: Baltic Outlook May issue is out! ✈️ This month in the spotlight is the city of our new base - Tampere! 🇫🇮 The second biggest city in the happiest country in the world, will charm you with it's people, nature and history. Dive into more stories here 👉 https://t.co/vEqifJkX0s https://t.co/gCtcDhcgnb

data.text: We are excited to welcome the 34th @Airbus A220-300 jet in our fleet, registered as YL-ABH ✈️ This is the second of eight planned Airbus aircraft deliveries in 2022. https://t.co/mcvmxtOUPJ

urls.title: Integrated airline transport pilot course (ATPL/A) - airBaltic Training
urls.description: Before applying, the candidate should make sure that their health meets Class 1 Medical Certificate requirements – the official version is available on the European Aviation Safety Agency’s website, a good explanation is available on the official website of the United Kingdom’s CAA – and should generally conform to high requirements towards a person’s health, thus existing health problems should be strictly self-assessed. Strict security checks apply as access to aerodrome infrastructure is required.

data.text: We are glad to announce that as of now, airBaltic will finance a significant part of the airBaltic Pilot Academy student studies. This plan will significantly improve student payment structure: https://t.co/ipBTbw9dxT https://t.co/Fv1uq0mI8N

New route for our new base - we're excited to share that Amsterdam is joining the Tampere network! 🌍✈️ Starting from June, direct flights twice a week to this charming city that is always full of life: https://t.co/DDREsFpnOk https://t.co/QLS99GTc6S

Each year we take significant steps in our journey towards greener skies by implementing more sustainable practices. We are glad to share our annual sustainability report, highlighting airBaltic's achievements last year. Access the full report here: https://t.co/uZVJNic1Mx https://t.co/y44IRMdwpO

urls.title: Think Green, Fly Green - Sustainability in airBaltic
urls.description: We are proud that through modernisation of the fleet and optimisation of landing procedures, we have been able to reduce our carbon emissions. Read more here!

data.text: Our comfy seats are so good that even Easter eggs want to catch a break, too. Have an egg-cellent Easter! 🐣 https://t.co/VDxfjyESuG

Take a look inside the brain of flight coordination! 🛫 We caught our Flight dispatcher Alise before her busy workday and asked a few questions to better understand what it's like to manage airBaltics day-to-day flight operations. 
👉 Find out more: https://t.co/ncCd6Yxp6s https://t.co/c5XCkDbnPw

During the year 2021, the revenue of airBaltic Group reached EUR 204.1 million, up 41% compared to the previous year. We were delighted to carry 1.63 million passengers and we are looking forward to welcoming even more this year while offering 94 routes: https://t.co/6EQbwb2ZPI https://t.co/nOvo71ovYb

Latvian airline airBaltic invites you to join the Annual Press Conference today, on April 14, at 11:30 a.m. EEST hosted by airBaltic board members.
To join the event, click here: https://t.co/QtlhQXyQ6N https://t.co/yPhHHOgat6
Coming tomorrow: airBaltic Annual Press Conference starting at 11:30 a.m. EEST, livestream link will be published before the conference! ⏰ https://t.co/uFUqfrZgpq

We are proud to have received the highest ranking among Latvian brands in the European Sustainable Brand Index in the transport and travel sector! ✈️ Our airline continuously strives to be a sustainable carrier: https://t.co/ikoWdf03dQ https://t.co/H0yRcjIZay

This week, 83 students became shadows of airBaltic employees in 19 different positions as part of #ĒnuDiena 2022! Students got to know the daily life of pilots, cabin crew, aircraft technicians and other professions🛫 Thanks to everyone - we hope you're ready to reach the sky! 💚 https://t.co/Atfm5ShyHx

Get ready for another wonderful journey with us and pack all the travel essentials! 🧳️ Just this Friday and Saturday, book last-minute flights and add heavy cabin baggage for only 1€: https://t.co/fkzKntq7dl https://t.co/nh7QPqrlYJ

data.text: Join airBaltic and be a part of our innovative team as a #Blockchain and Social Media Specialist! 💻 If you are tech-savvy, enjoy diving into the world of #NFT and have experience in social media, apply and get ready for a career take-off: https://t.co/YKyfGudwGR https://t.co/RReGtxnlTb

For the 11th year in a row, we are honored to be recognized as the best employer in Latvia in the transport and logistics sector in the CV-Online Latvia @cvlv annual survey! 🎉 We're thankful to have a collaborative, motivated and supportive team, which is the key to our success! https://t.co/5uDO5YiDCQ

Another milestone for the books! Last week we marked 20 years since the first airBaltic flight took off from #Riga to #Vienna ✈️ We want to thank Vienna Airport @flughafen_wien for the warm welcome and look forward to building our strong partnership in the future! https://t.co/JjJ88T3Bhs

urls.title: Cheap flights to Baltics, Europe & Middle East | airBaltic
urls.description: Buy cheap flights to the Baltics, Middle East and Europe online today from airBaltic. We fly to 70+ destinations from Riga, Vilnius and Tallinn.

data.text:
During the 2022 summer season, we will offer direct flights to a total of 12 destinations from #Vilnius, Lithuania and 13 destinations from #Tallinn, Estonia!

✈️ Find a complete schedule of airBaltic flights and tickets for the destinations on https://t.co/GfcUoxzmDg https://t.co/SrFpeAGRTP
Greetings from Brussels! We are delighted to take part in @A4Europe #A4ESummit and reconnect with EU policymakers and industry leaders on current and emerging aviation topics. https://t.co/oN9ZpqDaSe

urls.title: airBaltic City Collection - Collection | OpenSea
urls.description: airBaltic – the flag carrier of Latvia, in honour of Latvia’s centenary, in 2018, invited everyone to vote on their favourite towns and cities in Latvia, after which the company’s Airbus A220-300 fleet was named. Starting with Kuldiga, these cities will now one by one be represented on the digital art pieces issued by airBaltic. airBaltic’s jet fleet is the youngest in the Europe, consisting solely of the brand new Airbus A220-300.

data.text: Have your vacation basket full of our eggcellent destinations! 🥚 Enjoy our Easter Cherry Sale and explore some new places or revisit the fond memories of your favorite cities! 🐰 Book flights till the end of March and hop on throughout the year: https://t.co/BpSH6xhlys https://t.co/OydStBnOSv

urls.title: 70+ destinations | Where we fly | airBaltic
urls.description: See the impressive list of 70+ airBaltic destinations. Consider where to fly and what you can do when you get there!

data.text: We are glad to announce that during the upcoming summer season 2022, airBaltic will offer flights on a total of 92 routes from Riga, Tallinn, Vilnius and Tampere. Start planning your summer travel now: https://t.co/TdEVf4gASn https://t.co/D3hyxzANaQ

Packing for a trip can be quite stressful, but we’re here to offer two solutions! 💡 Choose additional services such as heavy cabin baggage or checked baggage and never worry about over-packing!
❗️ Till the 21st of March, add baggage to an existing booking with a 20% discount! https://t.co/TSYNw8sSrR
Has the sunshine and blooming spring inspired some travel plans? We would love to get lost in the infinite fields of tulips and take in the magic that comes with it! 😍 https://t.co/VVYh0E08vK

You could say it's in our nature to be good at landings, therefore you can trust us when we tell you we got some tips on how to land your job interview! 🛬 Learn tips and tricks from our Talent Acquisition specialist and see our latest vacancies here: https://t.co/9jU3LeIsh8 https://t.co/T0d16kirVc

data.text: Wish to travel with class - have baggage, seat reservation, no change fee and more included in the ticket? 🧳️✈️ Use the opportunity and purchase GREEN classic tickets till 17th of March with a discount! Find out more here: https://t.co/JJ1JD5lUdj https://t.co/CYqnYm0uGt

Last month 125 200 passengers in around 1920 flights chose airBaltic as a part of their journey. ✈ It's almost five times more than during the same period last year, we're happy to see you all on board! Read more here: https://t.co/CFHxlU3i90 https://t.co/A9wYz2bPWx

Join the team: https://t.co/p6U30fEv8E https://t.co/1sHQ44R28f
